ygData.subject: Re: around the world
ygData.msgSnippet: Mustex slashes through the dense jungle. He finally comes across a cave. He enteres and sees a small machine sitting on a rock. He knows it has to be a

 Mustex slashes through the dense jungle. He finally comes across a 
cave. He
enteres and sees a small machine sitting on a rock. He knows it has 
to be
a trap,but he goes ahead anyway. He is suddenly picked up by a giant
hand of pure energy,and in front of a face of the same.
Face:Only the Rocak may have this.
Mustex:But I am a Rocak.
 The face examines him, and smiles.
Face:You are part Early Rocak,but for this tecnology you are ready. 
Remember,
do not trust the probabilities as they are. You are not yet a loose 
canon,
but you have begun to rattle unsteadily more and more. Change the 
chances to
move in your favor.
 He was sat down, and proceeded to recieve the generator.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Stallex and Rhesus are walking along(if you have any new beginning 
> tell me)
> when suddenly they see a group of proto-humans being harassed by a 
> giant
> beetle,and a giant grasshopper.
> 
>                          Predicons
> 
>  The 2 charged. The beetle then turnes. Then several missile 
> launchers each
> holding 6 missiles come out of him. 2 out of his sides, 2 out of 
each 
> of his
> arms and legs,and 2 from under his wings. They quickly about-face 
and 
> outrun
> the explosions. After the missiles are used up they charged.
> Beetle:Beetlebot Terrorize.
> Grasshopper:Hopperrop Terrorize.
>  They all meet in close range combat. They duke it out until it 
> occurs to
> Stallex to take tham back to the ship. He signals to Rhesus and 
they 
> begin.
> When they reach the ship Stallex puts his plan into action.
> Stallex:Carnitron! Drain all transformers with predicon frequencies.
>  2 matalic tenticles extend from the front of the ship and wrap 
around
> the 2 predicons. They are then filled with blue energy,and the 
> Predicons
> scream. They then fall silent and the tenticules retract.
> Stallex:How much power do you think we got.
> Rhesus:Not even enough for a take off.
>  The proto-humans then step out. A female steps forward and her 
> speach can
> barely be reconized(this is one of the 2 cheetor educated).
> Girl:Thank you for help us.
> Rhesus:Help you? Who helped you?
> Stallex:This is a war. They were our enemies.
>  She translates what she can,and the proto-humans start eyeing each 
> other
> suspicously.
> proto-humans:war...war...war...WAR...War...war,war,war.
>  So they charge at each other and begin the first of millions of 
> mindless,
> stupid,selfish,pointless,negociable wars in history(the one with the
> predicons was in self-defence).The 2 bots stare at the scene 
> remembering
> the human history they now  they have created.
> Rhesus:You see anything.
> Stallex:Nope,I was in the ship the whole time.
>  The two race back into the "Carnitron".
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Mustex miserably watches as the meter reaches 0 just as they 
touch 
> > down
> > in the jungles of India. Now he has to get some energy. He will 
> have 
> > to
> > hunt down some large animals. He knows it is not fair. It was the 
> most
> > painful thing possible to an organic to have their energy sucked 
> out 
> > of them,
> > let alone to end only in death.
> > Mustex:Carnitron is there any other way to get the power.
> > Carnitron:Well actually there is a small Rocak generator near 
here 
> > capable
> > of producing small amounts of Energon that might get us a little 
> > farther.
> > Mustex:I'm on it.
> >  He runs out.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > >  Mustex comfortably sits at the controls. The others had 
reported 
> > > that the
> > > ship seemed difficult to control, almost wild, but it is so 
easy 
> to 
> > > him.
> > > Several times it almost seemed that the ship read his mind. 
Soon 
> > they 
> > > will
> > > have to stop at India. It seems almost sad that at full power 
> this 
> > > ship
> > > could destroy the Ark like it was nothing,but it couldn't now 
> even 
> > > fly around
> > > the world at 200 mph or 1 billionth of its maximum speed(no 
> current 
> > > living
> > > being could survive its maximum speed although I may later try 
to 
> > > negociate
> > > wormholes).
> > >  Suddenly he is in a darkness.
> > > Voice:Master...master...master...
> > >  Mustex approaches a strange purple creature.
> > > Mustex:Who are you?
> > > Creature:I am Carnitron...Master.
> > >  Carnitron bows down to Mustex.
> > > Mustex:Ca-Car-Carnitron.
> > > Creature:Yes that is what you christened me. If you don't like 
it 
> I 
> > > am yours
> > > to change.
> > > Mustex:So you're the ship?
> > > Carnitron:Yes,but its not important. I am here to give you a 
> > present.
> > >  He raises his hand and sparks fly at Mustex. Suddenly he is 
> awake. 
> > > Stallex
> > > and Rhesus are there. Still,it is different. There are now 
> strings 
> > > connecting
> > > both objects and ideas to each other. He can even vaguely 
glimpse 
> > the
> > > universes core which was both everywhere and nowhere.
> > > Mustex:What happened?
> > > Stallex:Some kind of power surge. You look like a partial 
> > transmetal 
> > > now. The
> > > ship's behaving better maybe you taught it some manners.
> > >  He had. Now that they had talked the ship knew who it could 
> trust.
> > > Mustex:Let me have a mirror.
> > >  He isn't a part transmetal he saw. That would have effected 
both 
> > some
> > > organics and some robotics,this change effected only his 
> Robotics. 
> > He 
> > > knows
> > > what he is. He is a part Rocak.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > > Mustex holds a bottle of liquid energon high above his head.
> > > > Mustex:And so I Christen thee the "Carnitron".
> > > >  He smashes it into the ships side. It burns his hand,but he 
> > > ignores 
> > > > it. Then
> > > > suddenly sparks jump out of the side and cause his hand to 
> glow. 
> > > Once 
> > > > again
> > > > he ignores it.
> > > > Stallex:Why "Car...
> > > > Mustex:Don't go there.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > > >  Mustex,Stallex,and Rhesus walk along the Sahara(don't ask 
> > where 
> > > > their
> > > > > hover-cycles are)when suddenly the ground caved in under 
> them. 
> > > When 
> > > > > they
> > > > > stood up they were surprised to see a small spaceship.
> > > > > Mustex:I thin-thin-think it mig-might be Ear-Early Ro-
Rocak. 
> > Not 
> > > > the 
> > > > > late
> > > > > mind you,but still a 300 year technological quantum leap 
> ahead 
> > of 
> > > > us.
> > > > >  They walk inside and examine it.
> > > > > Mustex:The good news is this ship could fly the 3 of us to 
> > > > Cybertron 
> > > > > for
> > > > > Maximal reinforcements. The bad news is the powercells are 
> > shot. 
> > > > The 
> > > > > bonus
> > > > > good news is that with this technology we can tap tousands 
of 
> > > > energy 
> > > > > sources
> > > > > on this planet. The bonus bad news is that the only one 
that 
> > will 
> > > > > suffice in
> > > > > less than 500 years is to drain it from animals,proto-
> > humans,and 
> > > > > other bots
> > > > > and that's just cruel.
> > > > > Stallex:If we want to be the best we have to make 
sacrifices.
> > > > > Mustex:True.
> > > > >  Mustex begins partially charging the ship woth some of his 
> own 
> > > > > energy.
> > > > > Stallex:Just be careful not to drain to much.
> > > > > Mustex:Just enough to pick up our wrecked hover-cycles
> > (OHHH!),and 
> > > > > maybe get a
> > > > > lttle more power out of them.
